Firestrike didn' see the acid shell till the last minute, trying to 
swing his sword out of the way, he failed.  He knew what was 
happening inside his most treasured weapon.  "ARRRR" he yelled 
as he drove the sword down towards Prowls chest.  The acid 
slowly burning through the sword.
